text: Yadi timila'i bhala'i prapta huncha bhane tinala'i naramro lagchada, yadi timila'i duhkha huncha bhane tiniharu khusi hunchan. Yadi timile santosagari allahabata dara manchau bhane, tinaka sadyantrale timila'i kehi pani noksana purya'una sakne chaina. Allahale tiniharule garne kryakalapako gherabandi gari sakeko cha
